column4: I've just upgraded from Breezy to Hoary. So straightforward it was mildly worrying! Question: how do I confirm that the upgrade has taken place? System/About Ubuntu says "Welcome to Ubuntu Linux 5.04"
i would hope not :(
did you upgrade from hoary to breezy?
yes
ty lowman62 that explains alot :)
some things have clearly changed. Just not entirely sure what to look for!
ok as soon as i figure out how to scroll we will be in bisness
what are you looking for?
anything to prove that the upgrade happened! As I say, it was so straightforward I almost don't believe it!
go to system than about ubuntu
you will be looking for 5.10
still says hoary
type in terminal uname -a
yes
Linux chandra 2.6.10-5-686 #1 Mon Oct 10 11:28:02 UTC 2005 i686 GNU/Linux
what kernel and info does it give?
Hmm. Perhaps didn't upgrade my kernel.
thats hoarys kernel if i remember right
thought so.
in terminal type sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
